text.div:
Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
1 Service is subject to medical necessity proceduresadded v2.3.1
2 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and agrees to pay for serviceadded v2.3.1
3 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and asks that the payer be billedadded v2.3.1
4 Advanced Beneficiary Notice has not been signedadded v2.3.1
